name: tags
summary: Explore tag usage in OSM files
description:
The tags command analyzes and explores tag keys and values in OSM data. It shows:

- Most/least common tag keys
- Values for a specific key
- Keys that have a specific value
- Unique value counts

Useful for understanding data structure and finding relevant tags.

options.-k, --key: Show values for specific tag key
options.-v, --value: Show keys that have this value
options.-t, --type: Element type: nodes, ways, all (default: all)

output:
Tag statistics including:
- Total unique tag keys
- Total tag instances
- Tag counts with sample values
- Value distribution for specific keys
